data.title: Dr. Dieter F. Hoffmann Obituary 2018
data.meta_description: Dieter Hoffmann Longtime New Lenox Illinois physician, Dr. Dieter Hoffmann, passed away January 11, 2018. After a long valiant fight with Parkinson Disease; Dieter, 88 years old...
data.text:
Dieter Hoffmann

Longtime New Lenox Illinois physician, Dr. Dieter Hoffmann, passed away January 11, 2018. After a long valiant fight with Parkinson Disease; Dieter, 88 years old, is at peace. He is survived by his wife Martha; son Dieter (Lynne) Hoffmann; daughter Heidi (Eric) Blischke; and four adoring grandchildren; Brianna, Renate, Corinne (Andrew), and Andy. If you wish to honor Dieter, please consider memorials to: The Parkinson's Foundation; Presence St. Joseph Medical Center Foundation; Will-Grundy Medical Center; or Silver Cross Hospital Foundation. Funeral services private. Arrangements entrusted to Kurtz Memorial Chapel, New Lenox, IL. Info www.kurtzmemorialchapel.com or 815-485-3700.
